summary: 2 companies battle for Cyborg domination. One's built a cyborg/Angelina Jolie so human, that they hope, she'll get into the competition's HQ and explode. But she escapes with her human martial arts instructor.
cast: Elias Koteas|Angelina Jolie|Jack Palance|Billy Drago|Karen Sheperd|Allen Garfield|Ric Young|Renee Allman|Sven-Ole Thorsen|Tracey Walter|Jim Youngs|Robert Dryer|John Durbin|Patrick O'Connell|Sheryl Mary Lewis|Lori Michelle|Elizabeth Sung|Matt Demeritt|Alain Silver|Galen Yuen|William Colon|Irving Bonios|David Schroeder|Rick Hill|Linus Huffman|Maureen LaVette
keywords: cyborg|corporation|bare breasts|social decay|fight to the death
title: Cyborg 2: La sombra de cristal
